review_title: Great team, challenging but fun job.
pros:
Flexible working.
Great company to work for.
Knowing you are making a difference.
Every day is different.
cons: If you like to be bored, this is not the job for you!

pros: Great training package Casual work atire

review_title: Could be a Great job if issues got resolved
job_title: Child Care Worker in Poole, England
pros:
You work with a variety of children
Can be working at a variety of places including in-home care 
Majority of Staff are Friendly
Feeling like you make a difference in the children's lives
cons:
Long shift hours, ended up doing a lot of lates and earlies back to back
Team Leader culture and treatment of care workers terrible
Not many benefits 
If an incident happened no one checked up on you

pros:
- Flexible working around personal commitments
- great to be a part of such an amazing charity that put absolutely everything into the people we support
- forward thinking, constantly trying to improve our place of work with staff rewards, recognition and retention bonus'
- paid training and support in furthering your qualifications and skills
cons: - not a Diverse Abilities 'con' but more of an industry 'con' that care workers aren't paid as well as they deserve to be for the phenomenal work they do supporting the people that need our help and support. However it is an incredibly rewarding job that fills you with pride!

pros:
Amazing team work.
Good sick policy.
Progression opportunities.
Fantastic group of young people and families to support.
cons: Shift work, but, with amazing colleagues :)

job_title: Child Support Worker in Poole, England
pros: The children and the Night Team Staff.
cons:
In my opinion it isnt a safe environment for the mixture of children.
In my opinion the Staff are not properly trained in some aspects of the role.
In my opinion Night Staff are viewed as just "Glorified Cleaners".
In my opinion there is a distinct lack of support for staff.
In my opinion the Children's Team is strongly lacking in consistency for both staff and children
In my opinion there is little positive communication.

job_title: Care Support Worker in Poole, England
pros: Excellent company to work for. Amazing support for employees, and plenty of opportunity to go up the ladder in your career. Rates of pay are very good, and I always feel valued at work. Very proud to work for this company.
cons: Not really a downside to working there! Apart from when you need to contact head office. Much better to just go there and speak to them rather than call or email.

job_title: Care Support Worker in Poole, England
pros: Good training ie first aid manual handling medication safe guarding, some good and approachable team leaders so nice clean homes
cons: A lot of abusie going on and being brushed under the table by management. A lot of staff bullying overall it a nice company to work for. Mange net fail to address issues  within homes, some team leaders bully residents and staff some homes very poorly looked after. When concerns are raised they are not dealt with in a professional way
